summary: The document is a confidential record sheet pertaining to the release of information under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details Ivan Gavrilevich ALFEROV's request for an Argentine visa for temporary duty (TDY) at the Soviet Embassy in Buenos Aires, based on full headquarters traces. The document is specifically intended for the Chief of Station in Buenos Aires.
key_findings: Document pertains to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
Details Ivan Gavrilevich ALFEROV's Argentine visa request for temporary duty at the Soviet Embassy in Buenos Aires.
Information derived from full headquarters traces.
Confidential document directed to the Chief of Station, Buenos Aires.
